name: The Island: Into The Mist 그 섬
description: 'The Island: In To The Mist' is an adventure game. It includes basic features of adventure genre and add some new systems to interest you. You have been given a chance to experience a group of university students, who confined in the island. There is a terrific but interesting story you will see.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Processor or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB or Higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
